int gfal_catalogs_accessG ( gfal_handle  handle,
char *  path,
int  mode,
GError **  err 
)

Execute an access methode on ALL the compatible catalogs return the result of the first valid catalog for a given URL

Returns:
result of the access method or the errno if error occured like a POSIX method. If No catalog can resolve this link EPROTONOSUPPORT is returned
